data.title: Birthday Dinner
data.text: Took our daughter at her request for her 18th Birthday.  Pizza was great and the waitress couldn't have been more helpful.  We have been there a few times and the service has greatly improved over time.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We're happy to have been a part of your daughter's birthday celebration! We hope you'll be back again soon! :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good
data.text: We have only gone once and had sandwiches. It was good but pricey. They have live music on certain days but not sure which. The restaurant is large and has outside seating.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi!
Thanks for the review!  I'm glad you got to visit us, and that you enjoyed your sandwiches!  We do have concert series during the year!  Right now, we are on a break, but when we do start our music back up, we will post the schedule on our website, as well as our Mellow Mansfield Facebook page!  I hope we see you again soon!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Burnt pizza Had to wait 45 minutes
data.text:
The restaurant is nice and well decorated
The food  was not good
A child's pizza was basically tomato sauce and cheese on a roll
The pizza we ordered took 45 minutes and was burned on the bottom
Will not go back

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Martha,
Thank you for the feedback.  While I'm glad you liked the atmosphere of our restaurant, I do apologize that our food failed to impress you.  We always want guests to receive delicious pizzas, and it looks like we missed the mark.  We'd appreciate talking to you more about your visit.  Please email us at mansfield_tx@mellowmushroominfo.com with some more details about your visit (date/time of visit, pizza you ordered, etc.) so that we can address this issue with our staff, and make things right with you!  Thank you in advance, and again, I apologize.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: I liked the variety available in their pizzas.  It was a nice atmosphere and tasty food.  My only complaint is that I ate too much....

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the great review! We hope you'll be back again soon so we can earn a perfect 5 "circle" review :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Mellow Musheoom
data.text: This is just not my "cup o Tea" type of restaurant. Too crowded and I thought I had to wait too long for the food.The pizza was as good as any I guess but pizza is not really a gourmet type food

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Doug,
Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback!  We appreciate comments from all of our guests!  I'm glad you thought our pizza was good!  I do hope you'll come back and visit us and try some other pies!  I'm confident you'll find some unique pizzas (or calzones and even burgers) you really enjoy!  We'll also continue working with our staff to make service more efficient, as we know that's very important!  I hope we see you again soon!  Thank you again for taking the time to write a review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lunchtime treat!
data.text: My friend and I met for lunch at this place in downtown Mansfield.  They have an extensive menu including pizzas, hoagies, salads and burgers.  We had a very attentive server called John who explained all the options available.   I chose a make your own small pizza, which at 10", was hardly small!, three toppings and a Coke came to $15.  My friend had a mighty meaty pizza.  The crust was great, some sort of garlic sourdough.  Parking is conveniently right behind on Broad Street and is free.  I would recommend this place.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the great review Alison! Our menu is meant to have something for everyone, and we're glad you created the perfect pizza for yourself! We strive for excellence, and we hope to earn a perfect 5 "circle" review the next time you come see us. :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Terrible service
data.text:
Party of 3 went for pizza on a Saturday afternoon. The restaurant was not busy. We ordered 2 pizzas. One was the meat specialty pizza offered, the other was the gluten/dairy free version of the same meat pizza. We waited patiently for our order.
After 30 minutes we inquired about out order. The waiter realized our ticket got lost so the kitchen never prepared it. He resubmitted it. Out order came out 20 minutes later. We got the meat pizza but the gluten/dairy free came out as a vegan pizza. We waited another 15 minutes for the correct order.
We never complained to the manager, we were just not returning. 
The manager on his own came to our table with our bill. He gave us a different reason for our order delay. He informed us he was rewarding us with a 15% discount on our bill. Needless to say we won't be back!

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,
I'd like to apologize for your less than excellent visit here.  We know that unnecessary wait times and incorrect orders can be very frustrating!  I'm sorry you did not experience the level of service we strive to provide.  We would like to know more about your visit so we can make this right.  Please email me, Loni, at loninice@hotmail.com so that we can discuss your visit further.  Thank you in advance, and again, I apologize.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Too expensive for your wallet
data.text: If you can splurge all the time on pizza then this is your place. But if you have a budget buyer beware. Single parents if you do desiderate to go keep in mind to just buy 1 pie to share and just water. If you don't be prepared to bust your budget. Good restaurant with good people but prices are very high. Stick with papa Murphys or even papa Johns for better deal.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi!
Thank you for the review! I'm glad you enjoy our pizza, and that you've experienced good service from our staff!  That's what we like to hear!  I am sorry you feel our prices are high.  We do use high quality ingredients and make each pizza fresh for each guest, and I hope someday you can find one here you believe is a great value!  I'd love to hear more of your thoughts.  You can email me, Loni, at loninice@hotmail.com so we can discuss your visits here further.  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Favorite pizza place.
data.text: Love the mighty meaty. Try it you'll like it. Be prepared to wait 30/40 minutes. It is fresh hand made pizza. It is worth the wait.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Phil!
Thank you for the review!  I'm glad you've had great visits here, and that you have a favorite in our Mighty Meaty!  We take it as a compliment when people have favorites, so thank you for sharing yours with others!  Also, thank you for appreciating the time and care we put into our pies!  I hope we see you again soon!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Neat atmosphere and fresh ingredients
data.text: Easy to find at an intersection in downtown Mansfield but can be difficult to find parking on a busy evening. This location is an old remodeled fire station and looks amazing. Staff was polite. Food choices were plentiful and ingredients were fresh and tasty. Service has a tendency to be slow.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi David!
Thank you for the review!  We appreciate your kind words!  I'm glad you enjoyed our variety of menu items, and the freshness as well!  That's what we like to hear!  I'm happy to hear you had friendly service too, and we'll work on being more efficient as well!  I hope we see you again soon!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun, Funky, Whimsical Sports Bar
data.text: This restaurant is located in the old downtown area. Parking is a challenge with the only available  option is parking in the rear. You would not come to the conclusion that this is part of a 150 location franchise chain out of Atlanta by looking at this location, but it is. The vibe is fun and lively. It has a large area with lots of booths, tables, TV's and a bar with 30 beers on tap. There are even some tables outside. I can recommend the pretzels, spinach dip, the salads, Maui Wowie pizza, combination pizza, chicken bbq pizza and the wings. The pizzas are hand tossed and can take 25 to 30 minutes to show up at your table. They also have take out available. Overall the food, service and atmosphere are great! The prices are a little high but still a nice stop even at a premium price. I can recommend and I will return.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi!
Thank you so much for your kind review!  It sounds like you have lots of favorites here (Good choices by the way!), and I really appreciate you sharing your suggestions with others!  We take that as a big compliment, and I thank you!  I hope we see you again very soon for some pizza and spinach dip! :)  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The BEST of Mansfield
data.text: Hand down the best pizza, calzone and pretzels I have ever had! The dough the use is outstanding, not sure how to describe it, fresh toppings, build your own or one of there awesome specialties. Highly recommend the mighty meaty. Ordered pretzels as appetizers, they were a meal of there own, made from the same dough, fresh baked, came in salted or parmesan or cinnamon for desert. Tons of choices for specialty beers or domestics, literally hundreds.  The servings are huge so go on and get the to go box with your order. The staff is very customer service oriented, fast and friendly. Will be back often!

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi John!
Thank you so much for the great review!  I'm so glad you enjoyed your pretzels, pizza, and calzones!  Our dough is pretty special to us, and we're always happy to hear when people enjoy it!  Thank you for the compliments to our staff as well!  I hope we see you again very soon!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: When its good, its very very good, but...
data.text: This restaurant has a fun decor cleverly created by a local artist with a steam punk influence. The food is trendy with a lot of organics and homemade specialties. Service can be very good or you might need to go the kitchen to see if somebody's still around.  They seem to have problems keeping a cook and operating in a timely manner. But when it's good,  it's really really good! There's a fun outdoor seating area in the back that features a covered venue for live music. Parking is a little strange, it doesn't have its own parking. It uses a city owned parking lot behind the restaurant that may or may not have space. So during peak times, hunting for parking can seem like you're in a much larger city. And note: while we've been here multiple times we once had something very unsettling happen. There was a man in the booth behind us with two teenage girls who tried to fish my friends purse through the crack between the back of the seat and the bottom of the seat. We caught them in the act and told the manager who just went 'oh well.' Guess we should have called the cops instead.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Patty,
Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review!  I'm really happy to hear that some of your dining experiences here have been wonderful!  And I'm also glad you like the atmosphere of our restaurant!  We like to make visits to Mellow fun ones, so I'm glad you've enjoyed it.  I do apologize that service has been spotty, and especially for the reaction you received that you described at the end of your review.  I'd love to discuss this with you more so that we can find a way to earn back your full trust!  Please email me, Loni, at loninice@hotmail.com so that we may further discuss your visits.  Thank you in advance!  And again thank you for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good pizza
data.text: The pizza is really good and I love the soft pretzels for an appetizer, but my complaint about this place is the service is soooo slow. After trying multiple times, each time was the same slow service. I hesitate to return.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Kari,
Thank you for the review!  I'm so glad to hear you love our pizzas, and the soft pretzels as well!  We take it as a great compliment when people have favorites here, so thank you for letting us know!  I am sorry that service has been slow during your visits.  We are working hard to improve service and efficiency, and I appreciate your patience with us as we try to do better!  I hope we see you again soon, and please let us know if there's anything we can do to make your visits here better!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Disappointed !
data.text: I have eaten at Mellow Mushroom in other states and this location by far was the worst. The price is on the high end yet most of my pizza was nothing more than bread. I ordered a pizza supposedly to be loaded with meat only to hunt for it on each slice. When I did have meat on a slice it was all located in one spot. How long does it take to spread the items out a little?  I will never be back!

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback.  I'm sorry your visit here was not excellent, and that your pizza was not served to standard!  We take pride in serving well-made, unique pizzas here, and I'm very sorry that was not the case here.  Would you please email me, Loni, at loninice@hotmail.com with some more details about your visit (date/time of visit, name of your server, any other details you'd like to share)?  This will help me address this issue with the right people, and make it right with you!  Thank you in advance, and again I apologize!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pretty Good
data.text: Went here with a large group of friends. We told them we were coming so they were ready for us. On a weeknight they were still pretty crowded. They only assigned one server to our party of over 20, but the young man did a really good job of keeping up with everyone and our orders. The Pizza here is really good but I think it's s little pricey. The salads are pretty large and two people could easily share one. All in all this is a pretty good place to go.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Kevin!
Thank you for the review! I'm glad you enjoyed your pizza and salad, and that you received great service from our server as well!  That's what we like to hear, and I appreciate you sharing your experience with us!  I do hope you'll visit us again soon!  Thanks again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Pizza in Mansfield
data.text: Welcome to Mansfield, loved you in Southlake. Save me time and money staying in town for the same experience.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi!
Thanks for the review!  We're glad to hear you enjoyed Mellow before, and that now you can enjoy it closer to home!  We hope to see you often, and really appreciate you saying we have the best pizza in Mansfield!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love it
data.text: Probably one of the best Pizza joints around!! I really like how you can customize your pizza . You can have red sauce , pesto sauce , olive oil and garlic sauce etc.... They have every topping you could imagine. The atmosphere is pretty cool !! The concerts are fun to go to.

data.title: Yum Yum
data.text: Great service. We did not have to wait for a table.  Great Food. Interesting menu.  Great place to eat with friends.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Carrie!
Thanks for the review! I'm so glad you had a great experience here with everything from the food to the service!  That's always great for us to hear, and I appreciate you sharing your compliments!  I hope we see you again very soon!  Thanks again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza, good service.
data.text:
2nd time here.  I live out of town, so we always try to hit MM when we have time.  Made the trek and our party of 8 was promptly seated.  Service was great.  Pizza was great.  But of all things, apparently their dough comes pre-sized as they ONLY had large pizzas.  No small.  No medium.  No adding two smalls and making a medium.  So that kinda killed our plans to have several different for all to try a bunch of styles.

Had a meat lovers and a Hawaiian.  Amazing.  Some salads were split.  And some cheese garlic bread.  Yum.  Great meal, and service was stepped up from my last visit.

Good selection of craft beers, of which a few were had at our table.  Will be back.

owner_response.author: Kim S, Owner at Mellow Mushroom, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi!
Thank you so much for returning, and for the review!  I'm glad you've had a great experience with our pizzas, and that service improved for you during your second visit!  We do have different sized pizzas, so I'm not sure if there was a shortage or mix up the day you came in, but I'll make sure that option is made clear!  We can't wait to have you back again!  Thank you again for the review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
